data.title: SoundtrackINFO: Body of Evidence Soundtrack
data.meta_description: Body of Evidence soundtrack, music by composer Graeme Revell
data.text: 1. Main Title [3:15] 2. The Passion Theme - Warren Hill [4:51] 3. The Funeral [3:31] 4. The House Boat [4:36] 5. Hot Wax and Champagne [5:40] ...see complete tracklist Soundtrack Q & A Q: Madonna had a song on this soundtrack. I'm curious as to know the name of the song. Can you tell me which one it is? (from Gina in Ohio) A: Madonna didn't contribute this soundtrack. She did, however, release her Erotica album and SEX book around the same time as this film. (thanks to Box Rocker, New York) add more info Feedback  Email this page to anyone.  Ask a question about the music in this movie.  Add music info heard in the movie but not listed on the soundtrack CD.  Add other info not listed above (trivial anecdotes, press quotes, recording anomalies, etc).
